Row.Text: Combat victories generate [ICON_SCIENCE] science equal to the defeted unit's [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength. +5 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength agains barbarians. Allows the construction of Bibliotecas Populares with the discovery of writing.
Replaces the library. Provides no [ICON_SCIENCE] science. Has 2 [ICON_GREATWORK_WRITING] great work of writing slots and 1 for great works of any type.
